review_blob: Rich lager, fruity, deep-- very nice.  I found it a refreshingly good lager among myriad lagers that never cease to underperform.
Medium high carbonation, easy taste, somewhat vibrant at times, but ultimately a little disappointing.
Deep, dark, ruby red stout with a mellow fruitcake maltiness.  Truly amazing.  Redefined my concept of a stoudt.  1999 Winter beer of Britain champion.
Dark, malty, and out to kick some butt.  Strong alcholic finish over a smooth rich sweetness.  This beer rocked my world.
